capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's no surprise that she's so skilled in the magical arts. I think what really sets her apart, though, is her unwavering commitment to fighting against the Dark Arts and promoting fairness and equality among all wizards and witches.
